metaDescription: Weavy is a complete toolkit for developers to add collaboration, productivity, and community features to web and mobile apps at a fraction of the cost and time. Our API, SDKs and UI Kits for Chat, Files, and Feeds enable dev teams to increase functionality and connect users, while focusing on your core product.
apiDescription: Weavy is a complete toolkit for developers to add collaboration, productivity, and community features to web and mobile apps at a fraction of the cost and time. Our API, SDKs and UI Kits for Chat, Files, and Feeds enable dev teams to increase functionality and connect users, while focusing on your core product.

parameters.name: contextual
parameters.description:
`true` to lists contextual apps, `false` to list non-contextual apps; when not specified both types are listed.
            Default value is `true`.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Guids of app types to list. Can be used to return only conversations of a specified type. When not specied all types of apps are returned.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A query used to find matching items.

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: List items with the specified tag.

parameters.name: trashed
parameters.description: Indicates whether trashed items should be listed (default is `false`). Specify `null` to return both trashed and non-trashed items.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Specifies the sort order and direction for the listing, e.g. "`name`" or "`name+desc`"

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return in the listing. Should be a value between `1` and `100`. Default is `25`.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip. Used together with `top` to return a specific range of items (for pagination).

parameters.name: countOnly
parameters.description: `true` to only return the *number* of matching items; when this is specified the response will only contain the `count` property.

responses.description: Represents a collection of objects that can be paged.

parameters.name: app
parameters.description: App identifier (`id` or `uid`).

responses.description: No Content

parameters.description: App identifier (`id` or `uid`).

parameters.name: trashed
parameters.description: `true` to return app even if trashed, otherwise `false`.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description:
`true` lists unread conversations, `false` list read conversations and `null` lists all conversations;
            default is `null`.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Guids of app types to list. Can be used to return only conversations of a specified type, e.g. chat rooms. When not specied all types of conversations are returned.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: List notifications that were triggered by actions of this type, e.g. `message_created` or `comment_updated` etc.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: `true` lists unread notifications, `false` lists read notifications and `null` (https://www.weavy.com/docs lists all notifications whether they are read or not.

parameters.description: Specifies the sort order and direction for the listing, e.g. "`name`" or "`name+desc`"

parameters.name: top
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return in the listing. Should be a value between `1` and `100`. Default is `25`.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip. Used together with `top` to return a specific range of items (for pagination).

parameters.name: countOnly
parameters.description: `true` to only return the *number* of matching items; when this is specified the response will only contain the `count` property.

repositoryDescription: Weavy is a complete toolkit for developers to add collaboration, productivity, and community features to web and mobile apps at a fraction of the cost and time. Our API, SDKs and UI Kits for Chat, Files, and Feeds enable dev teams to increase functionality and connect users, while focusing on your core product.
typescriptSdkUsageCode:
import { Weavy } from 'weavy-typescript-sdk';

const weavy = new Weavy()
